entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a wizard who has never gone camping before. He is excited to set up the tents by hand.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who helps him figure out where to put the poles and pegs for the tent.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: A wizard who is part of the group setting up the tents. He gets overexcited when using the mallet.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is also a wizard.

entities.name: charlie
entities.description: Another one of Harry's friends who is a wizard.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is also a wizard.

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: Non-magical people who are able to set up tents by hand.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione work together to figure out where to put the poles and pegs for the tent.
Mr. Weasley gets overexcited when using the mallet, making it harder for Harry and Hermione to set up the tent.
Harry is friends with Bill, who is also a wizard.
Harry is friends with Charlie, who is also a wizard.
Harry is friends with Percy, who is also a wizard.
